nodes.text: Gokobs were a species of friendly, hairless rodents found in the canopies of the forests of Ossus. When frightened, they sprayed a stinking mist. Gokobs spent much of their time scavenging off food scraps and potams from the Jedi academy kitchens.
Many escaped offworld, stowing aboard the many ships departing from the Academy during the New Jedi Order's use of it.
